creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: small book with grey cover; prints of bird wing shapes, squares, words and portions of words; wrapped in a black cloth; 64 pp.
medium: Black laser-printed images overprinted with polychrome letterpress; bound volume
provenance: The artist, London; (Booklyn Artist Alliance, New York); sold to MIA, 2003.
signed: On last page, in pencil: ho 23/ -/ 30/ K. Campbell \'99
title: 'sWings, 'sWings
